attributes.action: Change everyones name to include "tinder" at the end.  For example, Jo would become Jotinder!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone needs to have sikh names nowadays because they are much more 'emphasizable'.  Tinder is a common ending to sikh names, and thusly, we should all use this as an example.  Davindertinderpal Singh!  Give the ball to Inderjit!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
